Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Player.Player
public class Player extends Object
This class represent one single player.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname, int numOfPlayers, int dashboardID, Squads squad)
      Constructor of the player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - valid nickname chosen by the player.
      numOfPlayers - number of players that are going to play the game.
      dashboardID - ID of the dashboard associated to the player.
      squad - team chosen by the player.
